page.title: 06Joanne's Poem
page.content: In the church it's dark and cold, The windows shimmer like jewels around your neck. The carved wooden eagle, Sits tall and upright, Like a jet aeroplane about to take flight. Rays from the sun escape through the door, Then it leaves the church cold dark and lifeless, Like it was once before. Statues watching over you, Elegant and tall, You get out of their way quickly, before they fall. Fog in my mind,darkness in my mind, Echo me,echo me,echo me, Am i alone,or is this whole place alive? Because it echos me echos me echo me.
